title: Want to play Dominion?
body: I have set up a chat room called Dominion, interested in playing if we can find people :).

replies.body: I'm always up for playing Dominion as well - I'm sitting in DominateDominion on auto-join, and generally if I'm around in that chat (and not busy at work!) I'll be up for a game!

So this explains why a bunch of people just popped into the room last night and sparked a conversation out of nowhere. Sorry I couldn't hang around for a game, had an early morning due to patch going out.
But if anyone wants to play Dominion (actual Dominion, I swear all I get is Hide and Seek invites) I'd be happy to play!
Will jump in after my game. How active has it proven?
there's also one called dominate dominion, though I'm not sure how many people actually join it anymore. I'm pretty sure riot gehirn has it on autojoin though.
As in hide and Seek or actual Dominion?
